Audio.Locality: Serra da Cantareira, Guarulhos, Sao Paulo state
Audio.Author: Jeremy Minns
Audio.Comments: Edge of secondary montane forest. Several birds around a feeder. The very high frequency song is by a bird perched in a nearby tree.
Audio.BackgroundSpecies: Thamnophilus caerulescens,Grallaria varia,Hemitriccus orbitatus,Vireo olivaceus,Thraupis sayaca
